move, Google co-founder Larry Page will replace Eric Schmidt and take over as Chief Executive Officer in April. Mr Eric Schmidt , who became CEO in 2001, will assume the role of Executive Chairman, focusing externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership , according to the official Google blog spot.
